Summary: Large Bright light that moved from one point to another fast, then disappeared
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Murrysville
There was one other sighting in Murrysville on or around October 20th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsTraveling (south) EAST on Turnpike 76 from Harmarville, PA to Monroeville exit I noticed a bright large star-like light out left front window. Thought it was a very bright star then suddenly it moved from stationary position to the right really fast, stopped, then faded out completely. The estimation of the amount of travel is about two feet at arms length in about 2 seconds at most. The light made some sort of lighted trail the length of travel, that did not linger. Probably 35 degrees high in sky. Not knowing the objects size, I can't tell how far away it was, but guessing it was maybe over highway 286 or past it towards Murrysville or farther?
